hubs.categoryDescription: Central repository for academic materials including lecture slides, tutorial worksheets, lab exercises, past year examination papers, and course assessments. Organized by course codes and academic sessions for easy access and reference.

hubs.categoryDescription: Archive of departmental meetings including video recordings, minutes, action items, and follow-up reports. Contains both regular faculty meetings and special committee sessions, organized chronologically with searchable agenda topics.

Semester-wise scheduling information including lecture halls, lab allocations, and tutorial room assignments. Features both undergraduate and postgraduate timetables with real-time updates for venue changes and special arrangements.
